duck: Trapezium (play), a play by Henry Rathvon
Trapezium (astronomy), a group of stars in the Orion Nebula
trapezium definition: a quadrilateral with no parallel sides.

wiki.text:
The word 'trapezium' has several meanings: *(Outside the US) – a quadrilateral
with one pair of parallel sides, known in the US as a '[[trapezoid]]'. *(In the
US) – a quadrilateral with no parallel sides (a shape known elsewhere as a
general irregular quadrilateral). *Trapezium (bone), a bone in the wrist
*Trapezium (astronomy), a group of stars in the Orion Nebula *''Trapezium''
(play), a play by Henry Rathvon
wiki.title: trapezium
